Hi, I'm Kyle

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I'm 18 and I'm from South Africa but I've lived in Denmark for the past 12 years.

I've always been a bit of a geek, and I still love video games. These interests got me into video game programming and programming in general, at around age 10.

Since then, I've programmed everything I can think of from "Hello World!" to games and webservers.

I try not to think of myself as specialized in one thing, but rather flexible and eager to learn anything new.

While I know I've still got a lot to learn. I've learned, memorised and practised the basics for a long time, and I want to take my skills to the next level.

Click on the buttons above to see a quick write-up of what I can do and how confident I feel in a few languages
